description.value:
Master-Crafted Relic Tome of the Deathwatch. A Tome of archives, templates, and lore of the Mechanicus. Difficult to navigate and study, but possessing lots of information. Grants +10 to Forbidden Lore (Mechanicus), and +2d10 to Tech-Use Tests (roll each time).

Requirements

Can only be Requisitioned by Techmarines

Effect: Hero

Notes: 30 R
